description: This vegan bruschetta is made with toasted baguette slices topped with creamy cashew cheese and your choice of three toppings.
keywords: Creamy Cashew Cheese, Vegan Bruschetta, Vegan Bruschetta recipe, Vegan Bruschetta with Creamy Cashew Cheese
name: Vegan Bruschetta (3 Ways!) with Creamy Cashew Cheese
recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw cashews (soaked in water 4-8 hours, drained and rinsed)
1/4 cup Friendly Farms original unsweetened soy or almondmilk
1/4 teaspoon Stonemill iodized salt (plus more to taste)
3 medium bell peppers (assorted colors (available in 3-packs at ALDI), finely diced)
1 tablespoon SimplyNature Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil
8 ounces fresh strawberries hulled and diced
2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh mint leaves
2 cups diced Roma tomatoes (about 4 medium tomatoes)
1/2 teaspoon Stonemill crushed red pepper flakes (or more to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375Â°F. Place the baguette directly onto the oven rack and bake until lightly browned on the outside, about 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool. (Leave the oven on if you plan on making the balsamic bell pepper bruschetta topping.)
